Attribute.AttributeName: System.Windows.Markup.ContentProperty("Arguments")

summary.span: 表示 属性。

span.span: Represents a property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这表示属性的架构信息 (名称、允许的值等)。This represents the schema information (name, allowed values, and so on) of a property. 由于这只是架构信息, 因此没有任何字段 (如 "Value") 可用于获取/设置此属性的值。Because this is just schema information, there is no field such as "Value" to get/set the value of this property. 如果手动实例化此类, 请在设置对象的第一个属性之前和设置最后一个属性后调用。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

summary.span: 获取或设置此属性所属的类别的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the category to which this property belongs.

value.span: 此属性所属的类别的名称。

span.span: The name of the category to which this property belongs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此字段的值`Name`与包含类中定义的元素的属性不对应, 则会自动生成一个具有此名称的默认值, 并将其添加到包含类。If the value of this field does not correspond to the `Name` property of a element that is defined in the containing class, a default that has this name is auto-generated and added to the containing class. 此字段是可选的, 并且区域性固定。This field is optional and is culture-invariant. 如果未指定此字段, 则会将此属性添加到名为 "常规 (本地化)" 的自动生成的类别。When this field is not specified, this property is added to an auto-generated category named General (localized). 此字段不能设置为空字符串。This field cannot be set to the empty string.

summary.span: 获取或设置对命令行构造函数的提示，该提示告知是否在命令行中包含此属性。

value.span: 命令行构造函数的提示。

span.span: The hint to the command-line constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些属性仅由目标使用, 不会包含在命令行中。Some properties are used only by the targets and are not to be included in the command line. 其他属性 (例如, 任务参数) 以它们发出的开关/值的形式包含在命令行中。Other properties, for example, task parameters, are included in the command line in the form of the switch/value that they emit. 此字段是可选的, 默认情况下, 具有值`true`。This field is optional and, by default, has the value `true`.
